## Slice type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type Slice<
  T extends readonly unknown[],
  Start extends number = 0,
  End extends number = T['length']
> = T extends T ? Iterate<Start, End, [], T, [], false> : never
```
<b>References:</b> [Iterate](./types-kit.iterate.md)
